name: Dan Vs. Season 1
summary:
主角Dan是一個易怒、幼稚、有縱火癖、看什麼都不爽，
同時認為全世界也都看他不爽的人。
這一系列的卡通就都是在敘述他和世間萬物間槓上的經過，
真的是莫名其妙的無釐頭+好笑！
（by HornyDragon
info:
• 中文名: 丹杠上
  • 话数: 22
  • 放送开始: 2011-01-01
  • 官方网站: http://www.hubworld.com/dan-vs/shows/dan-vs
  • 播放电视台: The Hub

eps.name: New Mexico
eps.desc: When Dan's grudge against New Mexico goes over the limit, Chris (his best friend), Elise (his best friend's wife) and himself go on a road trip to New Mexico to get revenge against the state.

eps.name: The Wolf-Man
eps.desc: After Dan's car is damaged by an unknown animal, Dan concludes that the only possible culprit is the Wolf-Man, and vows revenge.

eps.name: The Dentist
eps.desc: When one of Dan's teeth is knocked out in an accident involving a stuffed bear he got from his dentist when he was a child, Dan concludes it was the dentist's fault and sets out to prove the man is evil.

eps.name: The Ninja
eps.desc: Dan's outrage over stolen cookies leads to the discovery of a ninja vendetta against Elise.

eps.name: The Animal Shelter
eps.desc: When loud noises from the animal shelter across the street keep Dan awake at night, he sets out to destroy the shelter once and for all. Chris's help however, hinders the plan after he accidentally eats Dan's poisoned meatloaf. First appearance of Mr. Mumbles.

eps.name: Canada
eps.desc: After an incident involving maple syrup, Dan and Chris go on a road trip, when they set out to get even with their friendly neighbor to the north, Canada.

eps.name: Traffic
eps.desc: When Dan suffers an embarrassing accident due to being stuck in traffic, he sets out to stop gridlock for good.

eps.name: Ye Olde Shakespeare Dinner Theatre
eps.name_cn: 丹杠上老莎翁晚餐剧院
eps.desc: Displeased with the quality of a Shakespeare performance at a local dinner theater, Dan decides the only solution is to shut the theater down.

eps.name: Baseball
eps.desc: Dan seeks revenge on baseball when the World Series preempts his favorite TV program.

eps.name: The Salvation Armed Forces
eps.desc: Dan goes to war with The Salvation Armed Forces after his car is accidentally donated to charity.

eps.name: The Beach
eps.desc: Dan tries to destroy the beach after a crowd of tourists damages his car.

eps.name: George Washington
eps.desc: After a tree falls on top of Dan's car, evidence left behind leads Dan to blame George Washington for chopping it down, and he sets out to find a way to get revenge on the long-dead President.

eps.name: Technology
eps.desc: After Dan's brand-new computer becomes obsolete right when it needs to be repaired, Dan heads out to Silicon Valley to take down Barry Ditmer, the CEO of the tech company that produced it. Meanwhile, Elsie gets assigned to protect Ditmer from an unidentified threatenning caller (Dan), until he decides to use Elise as the first subject of his mind control technology, turning her into his slave. Guest starring Kevin McDonald as Barry Ditmer, and Harland Williams as Hiram.

eps.name: The Barber
eps.desc: Dan swears revenge against his barber after he gives Dan a bad haircut. Guest stars Cree Summer as Becky.

eps.name: Art
eps.desc: Dan tries to destroy the artist who decorated his car without asking permission.
